title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 63.2 - Location of premises
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 63.2 - Location of premises

State Regulations
A wholesale liquor licensee, a wholesale wine licensee
and a winery licensee having the right to sell wine at retail subject to the
above-mentioned limitations may in the discretion of the State Liquor Authority
be located on the street level. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
63.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
